meanings.definition: A genus of South African plants in the iris family.
meanings.sent1: Ixias are beautiful plants from South Africa.
meanings.sent2: The ixias in the garden bloomed brightly.
meanings.sent3: The ixias in the park seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a colorful ixias paradise.
meanings.sent5: The ixias swayed gracefully in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A type of flowering plant with showy flowers.
meanings.sent1: The ixias in the vase brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: She admired the vibrant colors of the ixias in the field.
meanings.sent3: The ixias at the flower shop were having a party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like the ixias in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The ixias stood out with their showy petals.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'ixia', referring to multiple plants or flowers.
meanings.sent1: She planted ixias of different colors in her garden.
meanings.sent2: The ixias in the bouquet complemented each other perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The ixias at the market were gossiping about the tulips.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening grew with each ixias she planted.
meanings.sent5: The field was a sea of colorful ixias.
